text: @nytpolitics Obama administration endangered rule of law by falsely going after Michael Flynn.  Released records show that.  President Obama is covering his own butt.  Covid-19 response? Obama left system depleted.  President Trump got supplies for states.  Enough said.  Keep quiet Obama.
